item.title: A05 Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: The dataset The data used in this blog was obtained from The World Bank Data, to access the source of the data use the link below https://data.worldbank.org/topic/health?view=chart Initial Analysis Questions 1- whatâ€™s the country with the highest population in 2019? 2- which country has the highest population of elderly in 2019? 3- which country has the highest birth rate in 2019? 4- which country has the highest mortality rate in 2019?

item.title: A04 Shiny App
item.description: Provisional count of deaths involving coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) by United States county The data used in this post is obtained from Data.Gov and it shows the provisional count of deaths involving coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) by United States county. The dataset is intended for public access and use.
